question: who has played in the most masters tournaments
api_result: As of my last update in 2023, the golfer who has played in the most Masters Tournaments is Gary Player, with a total of 52 appearances. Gary Player, a legendary South African golfer, first competed in the Masters in 1957 and made his final appearance in 2009. His longevity and consistent performance in the tournament have made him a significant figure in the history of golf.
